TopicTitle: KSP Site will be down for a couple hours - Server Improvement

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

Just to let you know that we're going to do a small upgrade to our server and the maintenance is programmed for tonight's last hours. (September 21st, 22:00 - 00:00 Mexico City's time).

So we're asking for your patience and tomorrow morning KSP Site will be up again.

Cheers.

Hi guys,

As we announced last Friday, we were going to do a small upgrade to our server this weekend. Unfortunately, there were some technical issues that prevented it.

Now, I want to let you know that the upgrade will be done today at midnight (00:00 hrs Mexico's City time) and the site will be down for at least 30 minutes, so please be patient.

We know the Server is working fine right now, but we don't want to miss this upgrade because it will help in the future.

Cheers.

Sites were down for a bit a few minutes ago (right as I was trying to download, lol)

Verified via a few resources that it wasn't just for me. Everything OK?
will this fix the update for the pacher+v0.17

The server move brings one big advantage: the forum/site and downloads are separated, which means that even under heavy load (such as after a new update), the forum and KSP site will still work, instead of dying under the pressure.

Updates might still cause trouble for some, though.
